prompt: Re-write this music caption in three different styles. You can mix the order of the instruments.
inputs: This song includes Bass, Guitar, Drums, but without Piano.
captions:
Style 1:
This piece of music features Bass, Guitar, and Drums, but Piano is absent.

Style 2:
This song is composed of Bass, Guitar, and Drums, with no Piano.

Style 3:
No Piano is included in this song, which is made up of Bass, Guitar, and Drums.
